name: Trainz Simulator: A New Era - Create, Drive, Operate, Share
blurb: The world's favourite rail simulator is undergoing an extreme makeover - all new graphics engine, new features, new levels of realism.

rewards.reward: No Reward

COMMUTER REWARD LEVEL: Digital Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon ______________________________ If you like trains, or if your lucky number is 5, or perhaps your wife has banned you from owning any more copies of Trainz, then this is the reward for you. Receive 5 exclusive "Backer-only" High Resolution Wallpapers - available for digital download. Each design is a high quality render showcasing some of the amazing content that will be included in Trainz Simulator: A New Era. They are yours to enjoy forever while still allowing time to spend with your family. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Commuter" Status Icon, and as an official backer, you will receive our regular project updates. (See FAQ for more details).

STATION ATTENDANT REWARD LEVEL: Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon [AUD$20 = Approx. USD$18.70; \u20ac14; \u00a311.70] ______________________________ Can't wait for the next generation of Trainz but still want to support the project? Get your hands on our current Trainz products right now and decide about upgrading to Trainz: A New Era down the track. You can choose one of the following three options from our Get-Trainz-Now Selection. Option 1: Trainz Simulator 12 (Digital Download); Option 2: any 2 x Loco Add-ons from our Collection; Option 3: a 12 month First Class Ticket for premium access to the Trainz Download Station (see FAQ for more information on each Option). A survey will be sent upon project success to tell us which option you wish to receive. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Station Attendant" Status Icon, and as an official backer, you will receive our regular project updates. Rewards issued January 2014.

TRAINEE REWARD LEVEL:\r\nTrainz: A New Era (Beta Digital Download) + Full Version Unlock (For Additional Cost of $35) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon ______________________________ This is a brand new reward tier in response to your feedback. At TRAINEE reward level, you will be provided with access to Trainz: A New Era (Beta Digital Download) to participate in the exclusive Backer-Only Beta Test including access to the Beta Forums. You will be able to enjoy the same Beta Access as Trainz Crew level. To continue access after Beta, you can purchase an Unlock Code for $35 (via Simulator Central) to provide full permanent access to Trainz: A New Era (Full Edition). You will also receive 5 exclusive "Backer-only" High Resolution Wallpapers - available for digital download PLUS we'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "TRAINEE" Status Icon.

TRACK CREW REWARD LEVEL: Trainz: A New Era (Driver Edition) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon ______________________________ Drive the trains, operate the trains, feel the power. The TRACK CREW reward offers Trainz: A New Era (Driver Edition) This Driver Edition includes all the same content as the Full Version but does not include the world/session editing tools included in the Surveyor module. In other words, drive trains, sit back and watch the AI take control, but you can't edit or build your own creations. You will also receive the 5 exclusive "Backer-only" High Resolution Wallpapers for digital download PLUS we'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Track Crew" Supporter Icon (see FAQ for more details). Note: An upgrade from Driver Edition to the Full Version will be available via an in-game purchase.

GUARD (EARLY BIRD): Trainz: A New Era (Driver Edition) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection ______________________________ Jump on board early at the Guard (Early Bird) pledge level and you'll receive a combination of the Station Attendant and the Track Crew rewards. Receive a digital download version of Trainz: A New Era (Driver Edition) (not including Surveyor World Editor Tools) PLUS 5 exclusive "Backer-only" High Resolution Wallpapers for digital download AND experience selected Trainz products right now by choosing one of the three options from our Get-Trainz-Now Selection. Option 1: Trainz Simulator 12 (Digital Download); Option 2: any 2 x Loco Add-ons from our Collection; Option 3: a 12 month First Class Ticket for premium access to the Trainz Download Station (see FAQ for more information on each Option). A survey will be sent upon project success to tell us which option you wish to receive. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Guard" Status Icon (see FAQ for more details).

GUARD: Trainz: A New Era (Driver Edition) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection [AUD$40 = Approx. USD$37.40; \u20ac28.00; \u00a323.40] ______________________________\r\nIf you missed out on Guard - Early Bird, join the ride at the Guard pledge level, and you'll receive a combination of the Station Attendant and the Track Crew rewards. Receive a digital download version of Trainz: A New Era (Driver Edition) (not including Surveyor World Editor Tools) PLUS 5 exclusive "Backer-only" High Resolution Wallpapers for digital download AND experience selected Trainz products right now by choosing one of the three options from our Get-Trainz-Now Selection. Option 1: Trainz Simulator 12 (Digital Download); Option 2: any 2 x Loco Add-ons from our Collection; Option 3: a 12 month First Class Ticket for premium access to the Trainz Download Station (see FAQ for more information on each Option). A survey will be sent upon project success to tell us which option you wish to receive. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Guard" Status Icon (see FAQ for more details).

TRAINZ CREW - EARLY BIRD: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Exclusive Beta Access ______________________________ Get in early and save. Become part of the Trainz Crew and receive a digital download version of Trainz: A New Era - Full Edition (including Surveyor module) PLUS get behind the scenes access to the exclusive Beta Test phase PLUS your name in the credits PLUS 5 exclusive "Backer-only" High Resolution Wallpapers AND select one of the three options from our Get-Trainz-Now Selection. Get-Trainz-Now Rewards are issued January 2014. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Trainz Crew" Status Icon (see FAQ for more details).

TRAINZ CREW: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Exclusive Beta Access ______________________________ Become part of the Trainz Crew and receive a digital download version of Trainz: A New Era - Full Edition (including Surveyor module) get behind the scenes access to the exclusive Beta Test phase PLUS 5 exclusive "Backer-only" High Resolution Wallpapers AND select one of the three options from our Get-Trainz-Now Selection. Get-Trainz-Now Rewards are issued January 2014. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Trainz Crew" Status Icon (see FAQ for more details).

TRAINZ CREW (BOX): Trainz : A New Era (Full - Box DVD) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Exclusive Beta Access ______________________________ Become part of the Trainz Crew and receive a Boxed DVD version of Trainz: A New Era - Full Edition (including Surveyor module) get behind the scenes access to the exclusive Beta Test phase PLUS 5 exclusive "Backer-only" High Resolution Wallpapers AND select one of the three options from our Get-Trainz-Now Selection. Get-Trainz-Now Rewards are issued January 2014. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Trainz Crew" Status Icon (see FAQ for more details).

ENGINEER (EARLY BIRD): Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote ______________________________ Only 100 people can get up early enough to earn this reward. Help shape the future of Trainz at the Engineer - Early Bird level. Receive all Trainz Crew Rewards, get behind the scenes access to the exclusive Pre-Beta Test phase PLUS your name in the credits. This means you will be the first group outside the dev team to "test-drive" the new physics systems and provide feedback while there is still time to make a real difference in the outcome of each system. You will also help shape the future of Trainz by voting on which Two of Four feature sets will be included in the Initial Goal release phase (see FAQ for more details). We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Engineer" Status Icon.

ENGINEER: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote ______________________________ Help shape the future of Trainz at the Engineer level. Receive all Trainz Crew Rewards, get behind the scenes access to the exclusive Pre-Beta Test phase PLUS your name in the credits. This means you will be the first group outside the dev team to "test-drive" the new physics systems and provide feedback while there is still time to make a real difference in the outcome of each system. You will also help shape the future of Trainz by voting on which Two of Four feature sets will be included in the Initial Goal release phase (see FAQ for more details). We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Engineer" Status Icon.

ENGINEER (BOX): Trainz: A New Era (Full Boxed version) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote  ______________________________ Help shape the future of Trainz at the Engineer level. Receive all Trainz Crew Rewards except you will get a Boxed DVD rather than digital download version. Get behind the scenes access to the exclusive Pre-Beta Test phase PLUS your name in the credits. This means you will be the first group outside the dev team to "test-drive" the new physics systems and provide feedback while there is still time to make a real difference in the outcome of each system. You will also receive One Vote to choose which Two of Four feature sets will be included in the Initial Goal release phase AND we'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Engineer" Status Icon (see FAQ for more details).

SENIOR ENGINEER (EARLY BIRD): Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack ______________________________ Take even more control at Senior Engineer level. If you are passionate about Trainz and really want to help shape the future, this is your reward level. In addition to all rewards received at the Engineer Level, you receive an additional Vote to determine the priority of each of the Stretch Goal Features. The extra funds you pledge to earn this reward will also go a long way towards ensuring these extra features will happen sooner rather than later. You will also receive the first brand new DLC add-on released for FREE. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Senior Engineer" Status Icon. See FAQ for more details on voting and priority lists.

SENIOR ENGINEER: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack [AUD$80 = Approx. USD$74.80; \u20ac56.00; \u00a346.80] ______________________________ Take even more control at Senior Engineer level. If you are passionate about Trainz and really want to help shape the future, this is your reward level. In addition to all rewards received at the Engineer Level, you receive an additional Vote to determine the priority of each of the Stretch Goal Features. The extra funds you pledge to earn this reward will also go a long way towards ensuring these extra features will happen sooner rather than later. You will also receive the first brand new DLC add-on released for FREE. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Senior Engineer" Status Icon. See FAQ for more details on voting and priority lists.

SENIOR ENGINEER - MAC **New reward tier December 9th*** Trainz: A New Era (Full - Mac Version) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack ______________________________ After some behind-the-scenes negotiations, we are now able to offer a new reward level specifically for Mac users. Receive all rewards as per Senior Engineer Reward Level - except your digital version will be the Mac version, not the PC version. The delivery date for this reward is 90 days after the PC version. However, for every 30 new backers at this Tier, we will move the release forward by one month. So, 30 backers of this reward = Feb 2015. 60 Backers of this reward = Jan 2015. 90 or more backers for this reward = Dec 2014 release.

SENIOR ENGINEER (BOX): Trainz : A New Era (Boxed Edition) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack ______________________________ Identical to Senior Engineer except you receive a Boxed DVD Edition not a digital version. Take even more control at Senior Engineer (Box) level. If you are passionate about Trainz and really want to shape the future, this is your reward level. In addition to all rewards received at the Engineer Level, you receive an additional Vote to determine the priority of each of the Stretch Goal Features. The extra funds you pledge to earn this reward will also go a long way towards ensuring these extra features will happen sooner rather than later.  You will also receive the first brand new DLC add-on released for FREE (via digital download).We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Senior Engineer" Status Icon. See FAQ for more details on voting and priority lists.

ENGINE FOREMAN: Trainz : A New Era - COLLECTORS LIMITED EDITION METAL CASE + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack ______________________________ As per SENIOR ENGINEER (Box) except you receive the   COLLECTORS LIMITED EDITION of Trainz: A New Era encased in a metal case complete with an individually numbered certificate, full colour Manual and five 6" x 8" high gloss Trainz postcards and a signed Supporter Scroll thanking you for your support. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Engine Foreman" Status Icon.

INSPECTOR: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access  + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + 3D Avatar In-game ______________________________ Not only will you help shape the game, you will be IN the game - as a 3D avatar (with the name of your choice, subject to our approval). Receive all rewards up to and including SENIOR ENGINEER. (Upgrade to Collectors Limited Edition is possible via Manage Pledge). Note: You provide the photos, and we will create your own unique avatar. Your face will be wrapped onto one of 4 head shapes and attached to one of four body shapes . The avatar can then be added to station platforms, engine cabs or anywhere in the world. You can also choose to make the avatar private (only you get to see it) or public (anyone can see and place your avatar in game). We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Inspector" Status Icon.

COLLECTOR: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + Limited Edition Canvas Print (50cm x 30cm) ______________________________ For just $95 more than Sr Engineer, this is the ultimate Trainz collectors item to hang proudly on your wall. Receive all rewards up to and including SENIOR ENGINEER, PLUS a Limited Edition, Numbered, Signed Canvas Print showcasing all 9 major Trainz global release versions since 2001. This 500mm x 300mm print on canvas (unframed) highlights the cover art from Trainz Community Edition through to Trainz: A New Era. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Collector" Status Icon.
Please note that the description for "Trainz Collector" cannot be updated. Check FAQ for more information.

Estimated delivery: Dec 2014

DISPATCHER 2: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + Personally Designed Boxcar/Wagon In-game ______________________________ (25 more wagons/cars available). We know you like trains, but what about having your very own unique boxcar or wagon? Receive all rewards up to and including SENIOR ENGINEER level plus work with our artists to customize your own unique piece of rolling stock in-game to immortalize your support for this project. You can choose from a selection of 10 cars that ship with the game (or even a container or billboard) and design a unique livery that our artists will apply for you. The item will be yours to share with whoever you choose. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Dispatcher" Status Icon.

DISPATCHER: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection  + Pre-Beta Access  + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + Personally Designed Boxcar/Wagon In-game ______________________________ We know you like trains, but what about having your very own unique boxcar or wagon? Receive all rewards up to and including SENIOR ENGINEER level plus work with our artists to customize your own unique piece of rolling stock in-game to immortalize your support for this project. You can choose from a selection of 10 cars that ship with the game (or even a container or billboard) and design a unique livery that our artists will apply for you. The item will be yours to share with whoever you choose. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Dispatcher" Status Icon.

TRAINZ COLLECTOR: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + Limited Edition Trainz Panoramic Lithograph Collector Piece ______________________________ For fans who have been around from the beginning (or maybe fans who wish they had discovered Trainz sooner), this is what you have been waiting for. Receive all rewards up to and including SENIOR ENGINEER, PLUS a Limited Edition, Numbered, Signed Panoramic Lithograph (Poster) showcasing all 9 major Trainz global release versions since 2001. This 950mm x 550mm print on canvas (unframed) highlights the cover art from Trainz Community Edition through to Trainz: A New Era and includes a unique TRAINZ COLLECTOR bronze plaque with personalized engraving. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Trainz Collector" Status Icon.

TRAINZ DEMONSTRATOR: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Pre-Beta Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + Join the Team at NMRA Cleveland + T-Shirt + Dinner ______________________________ Want to meet up with the team, wear your "Official Trainz Demonstrator" T-Shirt and help us on the stand as hundreds of train fans drool over the first public appearance of Trainz: A New Era? Receive all rewards up to SENIOR ENGINEER, PLUS, join the Trainz Team for the USA product demonstration launch at the National Train Show in Cleveland, Ohio July 16-19, 2014. Includes dinner with the team on July 17. Travel and accommodation not included. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Trainz Demonstrator" Status Icon.

TRAINZ ENTHUSIAST GROUP: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Alpha Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + Trainz Enthusiast Group ______________________________ Bring your passion and experience of rail operations from around the world into Trainz. Receive all rewards up to and including SENIOR ENGINEER, PLUS join us as a member of the Trainz Enthusiast Group. You will have read access to the design specs for each system and access to private TEG forums to provide your feedback and discuss systems with other members. The Pioneer Council members will also have access to these forums and will summarize your feedback and move the key conclusions into the Council Forums.\r\nThe group is all about Organisation, Leadership, Design, Feedback, Advice, Research & Testing. If you display any of these attributes, then you qualify as part of the O.L.D.F.A.R.T Trainz Enthusiast Group - we trust you will wear this Badge of Honour with pride! By the way, there is no actual age limit to join this group.

TRAINZ PIONEER COUNCIL: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Alpha Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + Pioneer Council Membership ______________________________ The Pioneer Council will not only help shape the future of Trainz, they will become part of the development process. Receive all rewards up to and including SENIOR ENGINEER, PLUS join us as a member of the exclusive 25 person Trainz Pioneer Council. Your name will go up in lights - literally. Each member of the Council will be provided their own 3D avatar which will feature in a unique "showcase" mini-route. This in-game "demo scene" will highlight the new features and special effects of E2/T2 and will be the base route for early testing and the NMRA show in October. More importantly, as a Pioneer Council Member you also gain access to the exclusive "Pioneer Council" design forums. Here you can read the design specs for each system, comment on them and discuss features (planned or proposed) with other members and with the Trainz team. In addition, you will also have access to alpha builds (under NDA) and be invited to a monthly Skype online meeting discussing the project status with the team and passing on your feedback. Your name will also be listed in the game credits. You may even want to hold a mini-election in your rail group/country/region to sponsor someone onto the council as your representative. We see this reward level as a pivotal role in the Kickstarter process. It will offer complete transparency to people outside the development team and will bring a new level of community involvement to Trainz. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "Pioneer Council" Status Icon.

STATIONMASTER: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Alpha Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + Custom-built 3D Scenery Item ______________________________ All rewards up to and including SENIOR ENGINEER, PLUS we will create a high resolution 3D scenery object specifically designed for you. The item can contain up to 10,000 polygons. As an indication, this would include items such as your house, your car, a bridge or perhaps a bunch of items found in a factory yard. You will need to provide research data, photographs etc. The item will be listed in the credits as sponsored by you. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "STATIONMASTER" Status Icon.

SENIOR STATIONMASTER: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Alpha Access + Feature Vote + Free DLC Pack + Stretch Goal Vote + Custom-built & Scripted 3D Scenery Item + TEG Member ______________________________ As per STATIONMASTER reward level but we will add scripted elements and animations to your scenery item and possibly stretch the polygon budget (within reason). For example animated container cranes with a forklift delivering and removing containers off semi-trailers. You will need to provide research data, photographs etc. The item will be listed in the credits as sponsored by you. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "SENIOR STATIONMASTER" Status Icon + you will join as a member of the Trainz Enthusiast Group

TRAINMASTER: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Alpha Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + Uniquely Numbered and Textured Trainset + TEG Member ______________________________ You can't own a railroad in real life, but now you can create your own virtual railroad in Trainz - well, virtual trainset anyway. Work with our designers to develop your own railroad name, logo and livery and we will create a customized, uniquely numbered locomotive and 10 individually textured boxcars/passenger cars in full high resolution 3D glory. The type of loco and cars will be chosen by you from a selection of our highest quality stock. This trainset will be yours to do with as you please. You can share it with others for free or provide them for sale through the DLC store. You also receive all rewards up to SENIOR ENGINEER level plus your name in the credits listing the trainset and sponsored by you. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "TRAINZ MASTER" Status Icon + you will join as a member of the Trainz Enthusiast Group

CONTROLLER: Trainz : A New Era (Full) + Wallpapers + Forum Supporter Icon + Get-Trainz-Now Selection + Alpha Access + Feature Vote + Stretch Goal Vote + Free DLC Pack + Unique Design Feature ______________________________ Add your personal touch to Trainz. Receive all rewards up to and including SENIOR ENGINEER plus the unique opportunity to design your own special feature/function to be included in the final product. If you have a special need that doesn't fit in with the masses, or you would like to bring a feature to the top of the development queue, then this is the reward for you. We will discuss your idea with you, agree on a feasible project scope and devote 4 weeks of coding time to the task (plus additional testing and bug fixing as required). You will be involved at each stage of development from verifying the design specification through alpha implementation and beta testing. Your name and feature will be listed in the credits. You will also be granted access to the Trainz Pioneer Council. We'll also award you with a Trainz Forum "CONTROLLER" Status Icon.
